course.title: Clinical Aspects of Hearing and Speech
course.faculty_text: Joseph B. Nadol (Medical School and MEEI) and Konstantina Stankovic (Medical School and MEEI)
course.description: Clinical approach to speech and hearing disorders as practiced by physicians, audiologists, speech clinicians, rehabilitation specialists, bioengineers. Includes observation of patient care in clinic and operating room, audiology/balance disorders experience, lectures and discussion groups.
course.prerequisites: Anatomy of Speech and Hearing, Acoustics of Speech and Hearing or permission of the course director
course.notes: Offered jointly with HST 724 at MIT. Classes to be held at the Massachusetts Eye and Ear Infirmary (MEEI)
